document.full_text: after analyzing the genes of more than 50,000 people in the united states and europe, researchers discover five genes that make alzheimer's somewhat more likely in the elderly.
document.title: scientists link new genes to alzheimer's
lines_and_colors: after analyzing the genes of more than 50,000 people in the united states and europe, researchers discover five genes that make alzheimer's somewhat more likely in the elderly.
